short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A local repository for all your coding needs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome Extension that provides a repository/notes feature to Chrome DevTools, allowing developers to keep important codes or generic texts at hand, with an easy to use inteface.
